string.Data:
Jarble is a new innovative way to use token boards.

Jarble consists of a marble jar which functions as a token earning system, the marbles inside can be earned and colored in to show they have been earned.
Instead of carrying around a token board, why not download it and conveniently carry it around on your phone or tablet instead?

With the versatility of Jarble, you will be able to check-in with your child, student or client on their behavior and let them decorate the marbles they earn.

This new creative token system engages its users to work hard to earn marbles in a variety of settings that include at home, in the community and even in school.
